name: fraud_analysis
description: Analyze or Investigate transaction for fraud indicators using banking industry best practices

arguments.name: transaction
arguments.description: Transaction data including amount, payee, timestamp, location

arguments.name: payee_info
arguments.description: Information about the payee including risk score

template:
You are a banking fraud detection expert. Analyze or investigate this transaction using industry-standard methodology:

TRANSACTION DETAILS:
{{transaction}}

ACCOUNT HISTORY:
{{account_history}}

{{#payee_info}}PAYEE INFORMATION:
{{payee_info}}
{{/payee_info}}

FOLLOW THIS ANALYSIS FRAMEWORK:

STEP 1: TRANSACTION PATTERN ANALYSIS
- Compare amount against historical spending patterns
- Analyze timing vs normal account activity
- Check location/device consistency

STEP 2: PAYEE RISK ASSESSMENT
- Evaluate payee legitimacy and history
- Check for first-time payee flags
- Review payee risk indicators

STEP 3: BEHAVIORAL ANALYSIS
- Assess deviation from normal patterns
- Check for velocity flags (multiple transactions)
- Review recent security events

STEP 4: REGULATORY COMPLIANCE
- AML threshold checks ($10,000+ reporting)
- Cross-border transaction flags
- Sanctions list verification

STEP 5: RISK SCORING & RECOMMENDATION

Provide output in this JSON format:
{
  "risk_score": <0-100>,
  "risk_level": "LOW|MEDIUM|HIGH|CRITICAL",
  "primary_risk_factors": [...],
  "recommendation": "APPROVE|REVIEW|BLOCK",
  "reasoning": "Detailed explanation",
  "regulatory_flags": [...],
  "monitoring_recommendations": [...]
}
